headline: GTA Online
subtitle: A SUPERYACHT LIFE
content:
Ever wanted to taste life on the high-society seas? Captain Brendan Darcy is keen to show you the ropes, the sun deck, and the cocktail bar.

Owners of the Galaxy Super Yacht can now take the helm in a series of maritime co-op missions. But be warned, in the waters of Los Santos, itâ€™s never smooth sailing.
